Title: Relates to disallowing county industrial development agencies from offering incentives in municipalities which have their own industrial development agency
Summary: Disallows county industrial development agencies from offering incentives in municipalities which have their own industrial development agency.
LawCode: Add ยง863, Gen Muni L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law, in relation to disallowing county industrial development agencies from offering incentives in municipalities which have their own industrial development agency
